full_summary:
# Executive Coaching Tender

## Background and Overview

Invest in Canada HUB is seeking a provider for Executive Coaching (Leadership Development Consultant - Senior Level) services. This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders (SA Holders) under contract number E60ZT-180024/C who have qualified under Stream 8.7.

## Description of the Requirement

The selected provider will be required to deliver executive coaching services to support leadership development and skills enhancement. The proposed period of contract is from contract award to June 1, 2024.

## Contract Requirements

- Level of Security Requirement: Consult and follow all applicable security requirements.
- Contract Period: From contract award to June 1, 2024.
- Associated Documents: Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to the selected Supply Arrangement Holders.

## Selection Process

The selection process will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Previous Contract

The most recent incumbent is Advanced Policy Concepts Inc. The contract will end on May 11, 2023, and the contract value, including applicable taxes, is $99,440.00.

## Inquiries and Obtaining SA Holder Status

Inquiries regarding this RFP can be submitted to Procurement@invcanada.ca. To find out how to become a qualified SA Holder, visit [link](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/app-acq/sp-ps/conseils-guidance-eng.html).

## Important Links and Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

The delivery regions for this tender are:

- National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or assistance, please contact Jesse Lam at jesse.lam@invcanada.ca or by phone at 3236412.

Please note that this tender has expired and is no longer accepting submissions. Late submissions will not be considered.   

The rewritten entry is in markdown format for easier reading. The text has been reviewed and edited to ensure that all relevant information is included while maintaining a professional tone. The output is under 400 words as requested.
